RumorFact.Text: Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if I show her all I know with vision torch from the Damaged Laboratory on The Stranger?

ExploreFact.Text: After the vision something strange happened. The clouds disappeared immediately and I can now hear strange frequency coming from Solanum. There are bizarre looking sparks on her mask.
Solanum looks disoriented according to her reply.

RumorFact.RumorName: Solanum left some text near her body
RumorFact.Text: There are some new inscriptions left very recently

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum's message abruptly stopped while mentioning Timber Hearth.
